summary: A polished, brand‑centric website for Material Girls Quilt Shop that showcases its quilting supplies and fabrics through a clean, responsive design. The site will feature a compelling hero, detailed product categories, educational blog posts, a gallery of finished quilts, a shop front (optional for future e‑commerce), and easy contact methods. The layout prioritizes usability, accessibility, and SEO, while reinforcing the shop’s craftsmanship aesthetic.

sections: Add to Cart & Checkout (if e‑commerce enabled)

style_notes: Use a warm, earthy color palette (soft browns, muted blues, cream) with a primary accent of deep teal. Typography: Playfair Display for headings, Lora for body text. Grid‑based layout with generous whitespace. High‑resolution product images with hover zoom. Mobile‑first responsive design with accessible contrast ratios (WCAG AA). Subtle animation on CTA buttons and hero scroll. Footer includes quick links, newsletter sign‑up, and social icons. Consistent icon set for services and shop categories.
assets_needed: Hero image or 30‑second hero video (HeroVideo.mp4 or HeroQuilt.jpg)
High‑resolution product photos for each category (use Bedroom1.jpg, Bedroom2.jpg, sewing-machine-2613527.jpg)
Icon set for services and categories
SEO keyword list for quilting supplies, fabrics, workshops
Accessibility checklist for alt text, focus order
Google Maps embed code for address
